experience.description: Majorly working on AI-ML projects involved in the automation of sectors like banking & government, Working with existing/legacy system/code to find & fix the bug as well as automate the existing manual process, Coordinate with Data Scientist & DBA teams to Research, design & develop an application, Research & design the system as per the new requirements & technologies, Document the code & feature for independent operation.
Monitor & maintain the entire Pan India HDFC bank ATM network, Knowledge of database & Linux system, Coordinate with bank DBA & network team, to monitoring & scheduled job
